content: the into the fade crochet hat pattern uses a single skein of we crochet s chroma twist worsted weight yarn which creates a beautiful ombre fade when worked up this pattern is quick to make and gender neutral so it can be made for anyone the pattern includes instructions for both adult medium and adult large sizes this hat is designed to fit closely to the head **ad-free pdf versions of the full pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here** https //www etsy com/ca/theloopylamb/listing/927157161/into-the-fade-one-skien-crochet-hat
